title: Cassowary-J's Artwork
content:
[[[scp-international|International Hub]]] Â» Cassowary-J's Artwork

[[include :scpko:info:start]]
**Cassowary-J's Artwork**
**Original:** http://scpko.wikidot.com/cswy-j-artwork
**Author:** [[*user Cassowary-J]]
**Translator:** [[*user 2018]]
[[include :scpko:info:end]]


[[=]]
I drew this inspired by interesting SCPs.
My interpretation of it may be quite subjective.

------
**SCP**

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-5031" hide="- "]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/5031.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-7785" hide="- "]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/7785.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3333" hide="- I think it's described quite beautifully"]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/3333.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-1867" hide="- I just draw it"]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/1867.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3008" hide="- "]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/3008.png]]
[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show="+ SCP-702-ko" hide="- "]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/702ko.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

------
**EXPERIMENT LOG**
I simply sketched out the impressive parts.

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-5031" hide="- RECORDING ROUND 4 TESTS"]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/5031-s.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-5655" hide="- See Experiment Log"]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/5655.png]]
[[/collapsible]]


------
**INCOMPLETE WORKS**
I don't think I'll be able to update it often, so I'll upload it for now.

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3999" hide="- "]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/3999.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-1468" hide="- Looking at this again, it just looks like a bird"]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/1468.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-8999" hide="- I drew it upon request, but I felt that SCP-8999 would lose its charm the more detailed it was drawn, so I ended up stopping here"]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/8999.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-6636" hide="- Really interesting"]]
[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/6366.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

-------------

**HAND DRAWING**

[[image https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/cswy-j-artwork/1459.jpg]]
